## enableAndGetAgentApp() function

Enable an app and build an agent app object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableAndGetAgentApp: (adminWs: IAdminWebsocket, appWs: IAppWebsocket, appInfo: AppInfo) => Promise<AgentApp>
```
